<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">/// addDirectMem - This function is used to add a direct memory reference to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">/// current instruction -- that is, a dereference of an address in a register,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with no scale, index or displacement. An example is: DWORD PTR &#91;EAX&#93;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
